tika-abh08t27:2_1: sampayuttadhammabhedato pana ekūnanavuticittasampayutto phasso ekūnanavutividhoti evamādinā bahuvidhāpi hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t27:3_0: Nanu ca phassādayo heṭṭhā pāḷikkamena dassitā,
tika-abh08t27:3_1: idha pana kasmā na tathā vuttāti?
tika-abh08t27:3_3: Phassādayo hi manakkārāvasānā terasa kusalākusalābyākatasāmaññato ekato vuttā,
tika-abh08t27:3_5: lobhādayo pana anottappāvasānā akusalabhāvasāmaññatoti evaṁ taṁtaṁsāmaññāpekkhāya samānasabhāvā dhammā ekato vuttāti.
tika-abh08t27:4_1: Evaṁ phassādayo dhamme uddisitvā idāni “ettakesu ayaṁ dhammo samupalabbhatī”ti cittuppādesu tesaṁ payogaṁ
tika-abh08t27:4_2: dassetuṁ paṭhamaṁ tāva cittagaṇanaṁ dassento āha “catupaññāsadhā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t27:4_5: Āsavavisayattābhāvato na vijjanti etesu āsavāti anāsavā.
tika-abh08t27:5_5: Tesaṁ phassādīnaṁ dhammānaṁ uppattiṁ ekekaṁ uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṁ pāṭavatthāya pavakkhāmīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t27:6_1: Cetasikavibhāgaṁ vattukāmopi avinibbhogadhamme dassetuṁ cittena saha ekato katvā āha “phassapañcaka”nti.
tika-abh08t27:7_2: Kiñcāpi anantaragāthāya cittena saha ekuppādādibhāvakathaneneva imesaṁ sabbasādhāraṇatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t27:7_5: Vuttopi vāyamattho tattha apākaṭattā puna pākaṭaṁ katvā idha vuttoti.
tika-abh08t27:8_2: lokiyalokuttaravasena ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu vitakkassa desitattā āha “vitakko…pe…
tika-abh08t27:8_4: Vicāro pañcapaññāsasavitakkacittesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānikacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu uppajjatīti āha “cāro…pe…
tika-abh08t27:9_0: Ekapaññāsacittesu pītīti kāyaviññāṇavajjitesu aṭṭhārasasu somanassasahagatakāmāvacaracittesu ceva catutthapañcamajjhānavajjitatettiṁsarūpajjhānikacittesu
tika-abh08t27:9_2: Tesaṭṭhiyā sukhanti ekapaṇṇāsasappītikacittesu ceva ekādasasu catutthajjhānikacittesu,
tika-abh08t27:9_3: kusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tesaṭṭhiyā cittesu sukhaṁ jāyati.
tika-abh08t27:9_4: Tesaṭṭhisukhasahagatacittāni ceva tīṇi ca dukkhasahagatānīti chasaṭṭhicitte vajjetvā avasesapañcapaṇṇāsacittesu
tika-abh08t27:9_6: Dukkhaṁ tīsūti dvīsu paṭighacittesu ceva akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tīsu cittesu dukkhaṁ jāyati. Hoti…pe…
tika-abh08t27:9_7: somanassindriyanti tesaṭṭhiyā sukhasahagatacittesu ekameva kāyaviññāṇaṁ apanetvā avasesesu somanassindriyaṁ hoti.
tika-abh08t27:10_0: Ahetukavipākakiriyāmanodhātuvajjitesu majjhimagaṇanāya pañcādhikasataparimitesu kusalākusalavipākakiriyācittesu vīriyaṁ desitanti āha “pañcuttara…pe… āhā”ti.
tika-abh08t27:10_4: visesena vā vineyyasatte nibbānapuraṁ netīti vināyako.
tika-abh08t27:11_1: dve ekahetukacittāni ca vajjetvā avasesaekuttarasate citte chando uppajjatīti dassetuṁ “sabbāhetukacittānī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t27:11_2: Dasa viññāṇeti kusalākusalavipākavasena dviguṇite cakkhādike pañcaviññāṇe.
tika-abh08t27:12_2: Kathaṁ panete ekanavutiyā cittesveva jāyantīti āha “ahetukesū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t27:12_13: abyākatacittasampayogato abyākatāti kusalenapakāsanavidhānesu chekena satthunā pakāsitā desitāti attho.
tika-abh08t27:13_11: Dvīsu jāyanti no sahāti dosamūlesveva dvīsu jāyanti,
tika-abh08t27:14_1: Cittassa cetasikattābhāvepi kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṁ gaṇanaṭṭhānato “mano”ti cittampi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t27:15_1: Ettāvatā cetasikavibhāgaṁ dassetvā idāni ekekasmiṁ cittuppāde labbhamānarāsīsu aṅgavibhāgadassanatthaṁ “ekūnatiṁsacittesū”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t27:15_10: sukhasantīraṇahasituppādāni dveti ekūnatiṁsacittesu pañcaṅgikaṁ jhānaṁ pañcakarāsisaṅkhātaṁ mataṁ. Catu…pe…
tika-abh08t27:15_14: dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaupekkhāsahagatāni cha ahetukacittāni cāti imāni sattatiṁsa cittāni yathāyogaṁ catūhi jhānaṅgehi yuttāni.
tika-abh08t27:15_15: Ettha hi ekādasa dutiyajjhānikāni vicārapītisukhasamādhīhi sahagatāni,
tika-abh08t27:15_16: itarāni yathāyogaṁ upekkhādomanassesu ekekena vitakkavicārasamādhīhīti catūhi sampayuttāni.
tika-abh08t27:16_3: dvāvīsati catutthapañcamajjhānikāni sāsavānāsavānīti catuttiṁsa cittāni yathāyogaṁ upekkhekaggatāyogato,
tika-abh08t27:17_0: 116.Sabhāvenāvitakkesūti dutiyajjhānādayo viya bhāvanābalena vinā sabhāveneva avitakkesu dvipañcaviññāṇesu.
tika-abh08t27:17_1: Tesu hi vijjamānānipi sesajhānaṅgāni vitakkavirahena upanijjhānakiccesu asamatthāni.
tika-abh08t27:17_2: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyampi “vitakkapacchimakañhi jhānaṅgaṁ nāmā”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t27:17_3: Bhāvanāya avitakkabhāvappattāni pana bhāvanābaleneva upanijjhānakiccesu paṭutarā,
tika-abh08t27:18_0: Yadi evaṁ kasmā dvipañcaviññāṇesu sarūpeneva cittekaggatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t27:18_1: nanu tassā vitakkavirahena jhānaṅgakicce asamatthatāya rāsibhajanābhāvato yevāpanakavasena vacanaṁ yuttanti ? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t27:18_2: kusalākusalesu avijjamānadhammassa vipākesupi anupalabbhanato jhānaṅgakiccassa akaraṇepi kusalākusalesu desitaniyāmeneva sarūpena idhāpi vuttā.
tika-abh08t27:18_8: vedanā pana sabbavedanānaṁ sāmaññasabhāvena phassapañcake āgatavedanā ca aparena visesavacanena tattha niddiṭṭhā,
tika-abh08t27:18_10: Teneva hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ dvipañcaviññāṇesu saṅgahavāre jhānaṅgarāsi na uddhaṭāti rūpadhātuyaṁ tiṇṇaṁ
tika-abh08t27:18_11: mahābhūtānaṁ appaṭighabhāvepi kāmadhātuyaṁ sappaṭighamahābhūtehi samānabhāvato tatthāpi sappaṭighabhāvo
tika-abh08t27:18_12: viya dvipañcaviññāṇesu vedanācittekaggatānaṁ vitakkaviyogena jhānakiccākaraṇepi savitakkacittesu jhānacittasamaṅgīvedanādīhi
tika-abh08t27:18_16: dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena dhammasabhāvaṁ avirajjhitvā desitanti na ettha anuyogo kātabboti.
tika-abh08t27:19_0: 117.Tīṇi soḷasacittesūti pannarasasu ahetukavipākacittesu ceva kiriyāmanodhātumhi cāti soḷasasu cittesu.
tika-abh08t27:19_1: Manindriyaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ vedanindriyesu labbhamānamekanti tīṇindriyāni honti.
tika-abh08t27:19_6: Ettha cittanti sasampayuttadhammassa cittuppādassa adhippetattā manindriyassāpi ādhārabhāvo yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t27:19_7: Itarathā hi manindriyanti cittasseva gahaṇe tassa attano ca ādhārabhāvo na yujjatīti.
tika-abh08t27:19_8: Ekasmiṁ pana cattārīti ekasmiṁ vicikicchāsahagate vīriyindriyamanindriyajīvitindriyaupekkhindriyavasena cattāri.
tika-abh08t27:19_9: Pañca terasasūti ṭhapetvā vicikicchāsahagataṁ avasesāni ekādasa akusalacittāni,
tika-abh08t27:19_14: pañcasu somanassasahagatesu purimāni cattāri somanassindriyena saddhiṁ pañca,
tika-abh08t27:20_2: Tattha hi chasu somanassasahagatesu saddhindriyādīni cha somanassindriyena saddhiṁ satta,
tika-abh08t27:20_3: itaresu chasu upekkhindriyena saddhiṁ satta honti.
tika-abh08t27:20_6: sattavīsati lokiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekūnacattālīsavidhesu lokiyacittesu purimāni satta,
tika-abh08t27:20_10: sesesu ca upekkhindriyena saddhiṁ yojetvā aṭṭhindriyāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t27:21_0: 119.Cattālīsāya cittesu navakanti samacattālīsavidhesu lokuttaracittesu purimāni aṭṭhaindriyāni,
tika-abh08t27:21_1: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṁ aññindriyaṁ aññātāvindriyanti imesu labbhamānamekanti indriyānaṁ navakā.
tika-abh08t27:21_3: Sotāpattiphalato paṭṭhāya arahattamaggapariyosānesu taṁ na labbhati.
tika-abh08t27:21_7: Evanti chahi indriyehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci tīṇi,
tika-abh08t27:21_12: katthaci navindriyānīti evaṁ chahi ākārehi indriyayogopi,
tika-abh08t27:21_14: atha kho indriyehi saha cittuppādānaṁ sampayogopi veditabboti.
tika-abh08t27:22_1: Idāni maggaṅgasampayogaṁ dassento paṭhamaṁ tāva yesu cittesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti,
tika-abh08t27:23_1: Tañhi micchāsaṅkappamicchāvāyāmayogato dve maggaṅgāni etthāti dumaggaṅgaṁ.
tika-abh08t27:23_8: paṭhamajjhānikavajjāni catuvīsati mahaggatacittānīti cattālīsacittesu yo maggo labbhati,
tika-abh08t27:24_1: pañcaṅgikoti dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaresu ceva tīsu lokiyapaṭhamajjhānikesu cāti pannarasasu
tika-abh08t27:24_7: Sattaṅgikoti avitakkattā sammāsaṅkappo na labbhatīti taṁ pariccajitvā avasesasattamaggaṅgavasena sattaṅgiko vutto.
tika-abh08t27:25_1: tattha tena saha aṭṭhaṅgikoti āha “maggo aṭṭhasū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t27:25_2: Tattha aṭṭhasu cittesūti paṭhamajjhānikesu aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu.
tika-abh08t27:25_3: Evanti chahi maggaṅgehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci dve maggaṅgāni,
tika-abh08t27:26_2: Tattha vīriyabalasamādhibalavasena dve balāni kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātudvaye vibhaṅgavāre āgatāni
tika-abh08t27:26_4: Ekasmiṁ tīṇīti ekasmiṁ vicikicchāsahagate vīriyabalaahirikabalaanottappabalavasena tīṇi balāni.
tika-abh08t27:26_5: Ekādasasu cattārīti vicikicchāsahagatavajjesu ekādasasu akusalacittesu samādhibalañceva pubbe vuttāni tīṇīti cattāribalāni.
tika-abh08t27:26_6: Cha dvādasasūti dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttacittesu saddhāvīriyasatisamādhihiriottappavasena cha balāni.
tika-abh08t27:27_0: Ekūnāsītiyāsattāti dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu ca cattālīsāya
tika-abh08t27:27_1: lokuttaracittesu cāti ekūnāsītividhesu cittesu saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāhiriottappavasena satta balāni.
tika-abh08t27:27_4: Evanti pañcahi balehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci dve,
tika-abh08t27:27_9: imesu ekassāpi abhāvato abalampi ca viññeyyaṁ,
tika-abh08t27:27_12: Yesu cittesu yāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalindriyāni jāyantīti sambandho.
